flawed_nl_solution:
Her hair needs to be 53 inches long when she cuts it because 23 + 12 = <<23+12=53>>53
She needs to grow it 39 more inches because 53 - 14 = <<53-14=39>>39
#### 39

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
